segments.text: I'm afraid we have no reservation by this name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No reservation ? Well , then , do you have any rooms available ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid all the rooms are fully booked .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean we can't stay in this hotel tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right.We have no more rooms available for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , would you recommend any other nearby hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2
